com.mapdigit.drawing
Class FontEx

java.lang.Object
  com.mapdigit.drawing.FontEx

public class FontEx
extends java.lang.Object

Vector font class. each font is described by SVG path string internally.

© Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

static int TEXT_DIR_TB
          Sets the text direction to top-to-bottom, as is common in some Asian scripts, such as Chinese and Japanese.

Field Detail

TEXT_DIR_LR

public static final int TEXT_DIR_LR
Sets the text direction to left-to-right, as is common in most Latin-based documents. The current text position is advanced from left to right after each glyph is rendered.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEXT_DIR_RL

public static final int TEXT_DIR_RL
Sets the text direction to right-to-left, as is common in Arabic or Hebrew scripts.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TEXT_DIR_TB

public static final int TEXT_DIR_TB
Sets the text direction to top-to-bottom, as is common in some Asian scripts, such as Chinese and Japanese.

See Also:

getGlyphArray

public IShape[] getGlyphArray(int fontSize,
                              char[] ac,
                              int off,
                              int len,
                              int tdir)
Return a shape array stored each glyph for characters in the char arrary.

Parameters:
fontSize - the size of the font.
ac - the array of characters.
off - the index of the first character to measure.
len - the number of characters to measure
tdir - the text direction.
Returns:
a array of font character shapes.The origin of each shape is (0,0)
